Batok](/wiki/Bukit_Batok)Not-for-Profit519 ## Psychiatric hospital NameOpenedDistrictOwnershipBedsStaff[Institute of Mental Health](/wiki/Institute_of_Mental_Health_(Singapore))1841[Hougang](/wiki/Hougang)Public ([National Healthcare Group](/wiki/National_Healthcare_Group))2,010 ## Upcoming hospitals - Eastern General Hospital (EGH) and Eastern Community Hospital (ECH) in [Bedok](/wiki/Bedok), which collectively forms the EGH Campus. Will be operated by [SingHealth](/wiki/SingHealth) and have about 1,400 beds. - Tengah General and Community Hospital (TGCH) in [Tengah](/wiki/Tengah,_Singapore), to be operated by the [National University Health System](/wiki/National_University_Health_System) (NUHS). ## Defunct hospitals - [Bright Vision Community Hospital](/wiki/Bright_Vision_Community_Hospital): To be converted to a psychiatric nursing home in 2024. - [British Military Hospital](/wiki/British_Military_Hospital,_Singapore): Predecessor of [Alexandra Hospital](/wiki/Alexandra_Hospital) - [Changi Hospital](/wiki/Changi_Hospital): Merged with Toa Payoh Hospital to form Changi General Hospital on 15 February 1997. - [Toa Payoh Hospital](/wiki/Toa_Payoh_Hospital): Merged with Changi Hospital to form Changi General Hospital on 15 February 1997. - [View Road Hospital](/wiki/View_Road_Hospital): Used to be a subsidiary of [Institute of Mental Health (Singapore)](/wiki/Institute_of_Mental_Health_(Singapore)), but ceased operations in 2001. - [Assisi Hospice](/wiki/Assisi_Hospice) - [Camden Medical Centre](/wiki/Camden_Medical_Centre) - [National Centre for Infectious Diseases](/wiki/National_Centre_for_Infectious_Diseases) - [Singapore Cord Blood Bank](/wiki/Singapore_Cord_Blood_Bank) - [Singapore Gamma Knife Centre](/wiki/Singapore_Gamma_Knife_Centre) - [Singapore National Eye Centre](/wiki/Singapore_National_Eye_Centre) - [Fullerton Health Group](/wiki/Fullerton_Health_Group) - Acute hospital list maintained by the [Ministry of Health](/wiki/Ministry_of_Health_(Singapore)) - Community hospital list maintained by the [Ministry of Health](/wiki/Ministry_of_Health_(Singapore))
title: List of hospitals in Singapore
